name: 5.56x45mm  OCG Blackout
description: 5.56x45mm ammunition with subsonic 131gr tungsten bullets, a civilian/PDW version of the heavier 5.56 OCG Blackout. Trades range and power for low recoil, noise and good armor penetration.

name: 5.56 OCG Blackout
description: 5.56x45mm ammunition with subsonic 154gr depleted uranium bullets. While weaker and shorter ranged than dedicated subsonic rounds such as 9x39mm, they are more compact and can cut armor like a hot knife through butter.
//1: Less efficient than electrothermal ignition, needs more gunpowder
